text: Chicken Little is an American computer-animated television series based on the 2005 movie Chicken Little. It premiered in 2006.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L26Y2tl9VmY The series is about Chicken Little and his best friends hanging out and going on adventures while avoiding Foxy Loxy and Goosey Loosey, who are out to ruin the day for them and embarrass them. ==Characters== * Chicken Little (voiced by Zach Braff) * Abby Mallard (voiced by Joan Cusack) * Runt of the Litter (voiced by Steve Zahn) * Fish Out of Water (voiced by Dan Molina) * Buck Cluck (voiced by Garry Marshall) * Foxy Loxy (voiced by Amy Sedaris) * Goosey Loosey (voiced by Mark Walton) * Morkubine Porcupine (voiced by Mark Dindal) * Mr. Woolensworth (voiced by Patrick Stewart) ==References== Category:2000s American animated television series Category:English-language television programs Category:2006 American television series debuts
title: Chicken Little (TV series)
